ENGLISH: Your best friend today, nothing more, Razehl.
ZH-cn: 拉泽尔，我是你的今日限定好友。

ENGLISH: How do you know my name?
Take this dagger. You will need to fight your way out alongside us.\! Razehl, we know how they have treated you. These guards deserve to die.
ZH-cn: 这把匕首，拿去。我们会带你一起打出去。\!拉泽尔，我们知道这些守卫是怎么折磨你的。他们该死。

ENGLISH: No disagreement from you, I see.

We will have to take advantage of this facility's lighting mechanism.\! Here, we can trigger this switch and turn off the light in a segment of these hallways.\! Without the light, we will have the freedom to cut down an unsuspecting enemy from the shadows.
ZH-cn: 我们需要利用这地方的光照系统。\!我们可以在这里触发开关，关掉这些通道的灯。\!没有灯的情况下，我们就可以自由的从黑暗中干掉毫无防备的敌人。
